p: Fatty acid (FA) composition was measured in the three flour samples. Palmitic, palmitoleic, stearic, oleic, linoleic, and linolenic FA were determined according to the International Organization for Standardization (ISO) (ISO 12966-4:2015) [ 24]. The composition of fatty acids was determined by a gas chromatography-flame ionization detector, (GC-FID, Thermo Scientific, Milan, Italy). All the above analyses were done in triplicate.
